attributes.name: autocomplete
attributes.description: Sets the autocomplete method to use when the combobox receives user input

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the disabled state of the combobox

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: This element's value will be surfaced during form submission under the provided name

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Controls the placement of the combobox dropdown

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets the placeholder value of the combobox to provide a hint to the user

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The initial value of the combobox
